nodes.text: Malkii was a remote planet. It commonly served as a refuge for mercenaries, insurrectionists and terrorists, but perhaps it was most notorious for its reputation as the training ground of the infamous assassins known as Malkite Poisoners.
During the Kymoodon Era, Malkii was one of the earliest worlds to adopt the Pius Dea religion.
